Interface RegistrationForm

  • public interface RegistrationForm

      • validationMail

        static void validationMail​(java.lang.String mail)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to check if a mail is valid
        Parameters:
        mail - Mail we want to check
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throw an exception if the mail isn't valid.

      • validationPassword

        static void validationPassword​(java.lang.String password,
                               java.lang.String conf_password)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to check is a password is valid and if it is well confirmed
        Parameters:
        password - Password we want to check
        conf_password - Confirmation password we want to check
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws an exception is password and conf_password are not the same, of if the password is way too weak

      • validationPassword_opt

        static void validationPassword_opt​(java.lang.String password,
                                   java.lang.String conf_password)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to check is a password is valid and if it is well confirmed, but the field can be empty if we don't want to change the password. Used in Settings
        Parameters:
        password - Password we want to check
        conf_password - Confirmation password we want to check
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws an exception is password and conf_password are not the same, of if the password is way too weak

      • validationPseudo

        static void validationPseudo​(java.lang.String pseudo,
                             int idplayer,
                             boolean creation)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Method used to check is a pseudo is valid
        Parameters:
        pseudo - Pseudo that we want to check
        idplayer - Id of the player who want to check a pseudo, used only in modification try
        creation - If the check is on a creation or a modification
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws an exception is the pseudo is too long or too short, and if another player already got this pseudo

      • validationDate

        static void validationDate​(java.lang.String dateDay,
                           java.lang.String dateMonth,
                           java.lang.String dateYear)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Method used to check if a birth date is valid
        Parameters:
        dateDay - The day
        dateMonth - The month
        dateYear - The year
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws an exception if the birth date is not valid (e.g : 32-12-1997). It is considered invalid if year < 1900
